title: 감정 설문이 도착했습니다
instruction: 알림 도착 이후 10분 이내의 상황을 기준으로 아래에 응답해주세요

questions.text: My emotion right before doing this survey could be rated as (-3: very negative ~ +3: very positive)
My emotion right before doing this survey could be rated as (-3: very calm ~ +3: very excited)
My stress level right before doing this survey could be rated as (-3: not stressed at all ~ +3: very stressed)
The emotion that I answered with above has not changed for the past ___ minutes. (0 ~ 60 min; or type "I'm not sure." if you are not sure)
My attention level right before doing this survey could be rated as (-3: very bored ~ +3: very engaged)
Did answering this survey disturb the activity that I was performing before doing it? (-3: did not disturb me at all ~ +3: it was very disturbing)
How mentally demanding was my activity before doing this survey? (-3: very low ~ +3: very high)
How have your emotions changed while you've been answering this survey? (-3: I've felt more negative ~ +3: I've felt more positive)
